configuration.Comment: This file is used to build the configuration parth of the frontend. This is done at run-time, so errors here might prevent the frontend from running.

entryOption.name: linear
entryOption.description: The number of workers becomes the number of factories

entryOption.name: logarithmic
entryOption.description: The logarithm of the numbers of workers becomes the number of factories

entryOption.name: sin-log
